title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: voidSupporting Business Decision-Making, Gaining Competitive Advantage with DSS(Decision Support Systems), Analyzing Business Decision Processes, Designing and Developing DSS, Designing and Evaluating DSS User Interfaces, Evaluating DSS Architecture, Networking and Security Issues, Implementing Communications-Driven and Group DSS, Building Data and DocumentDriven DSS, Building Knowledge-Driven DSS and Mining Data Building Model-Driven DSS, Building Web-Based and Inter-Organizational DSS.
